Text: PricesJohn Just passing on some nightly info it looks like the last four nights HE have been very strong averaging in the mid s The west printed negative on the th and th HE Calpine and Aquila were offering power for HE every night Const or Mirant were bids I sold the mw short term ercot was long to CPS Alex

OOMEJohn ERCOT has OOME us for for all hours I spoke with Jackie and Hubert Davis at ERCOT about this and they will make it an OOME Yesterday it seemed we affected prices because prices spiked to HE and stated to come off as Frontera came on Alex M

EtteraEttera issues When hourly is asked to manage a day ahead position we cannot adjust the position in ettera and makes it a worthless tool the position cannot be found We have to adjust the day ahead position in the portal directly If we have a day ahead position and adjust it hourly it will change back to the original schedule when we submit another schedule Frontera is too time consuming and confusing when we have to show a buy from frontera and a sell to frontera when we buy from them The whole process takes to long on average it usually takes minutes to put an hourly schedule in when it only takes a minute when done directly in the portal Thats all I got I hope it helps Alex

Contactssmith PST Doug Here are some contacts that I could think of John Forney Home Cell pager work Alex McElreath Home Cell pager work Joe Capasso Home Cell Eric Saibi Home Cell work Steve Olinde Home Cell pager work George Phillips Smith Day Home Cell pager Jeff Miller Home Cell pager work Bill Frieje Home Cell pager Jerry Watson Home Cell work

FW Enron Energy Services hotlineOriginal Message From Day Smith L Sent Tuesday September PM To McElreath Alexander Cc Forney John M Subject Enron Energy Services hotline The EES hotline for commercial retail customers is Please sent all real time personnel this number so that call relating to commercial customers are referred to them Calls for residential should be sent to New Power at the number I gave you McElreath Alexander Smith L Day Enron Power Marketing Inc Ph Fax Pager
